casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

September 11, 2008

[Cite as 09/11/2008 Case Announcements, 2008-Ohio-4562.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2007-0268. State v. Smith.

Hamilton App. No. C-060077. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Hamilton County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for leave to file a stipulation for extension of time to file appellant’s merit brief,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted. It is further ordered that the stipulation for extension of time attached to the motion for leave is deemed filed, and appellant’s merit brief is due Thursday, October 2, 2008.
